object.creator: 杨智勇
object.name: lcIB_NHLCB
object.package: 100_新三板.挂牌阶段.04-内核流程表

column.name: YWLX
column.option: 1|权益;2|固收(发行前);3|债券;4|新三板

column.name: SJLY
column.option: 0|本系统;1|原投行系统;2|协同系统

column.name: XTLCLJ
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var url='http://oa.ebscn.com/workflow/request/ViewRequest.jsp?requestid='+OLDBH; '' //'下载'
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_NULLSUB(SJLY,'0')!=2||LB.getClient().isStandard==false

column.name: BZSM
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '
在底稿系统中完成“全面尽职调查阶段”底稿上传工作，并在本系统中完成立项审批流程后，才能发起内核流程。'

column.name: SFDYSJZQ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE('select count(1) rs from ecif.lcIB_NHLCB_ZQMX where instid=? and zqr=?',[InstID,$Login.User])>=1
column.comment: <font color=red>请确认您首次点击本流程的时间是知晓该项目信息的第一时间！<font>

column.name: ZQSJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> SFDYSJZQ==0||ABS_SQLVALUE('select count(1) rs from ecif.lcIB_NHLCB_ZQMX where instid=? and zqr=?',[InstID,$Login.User])>=1
column.comment: <font color=red>知情时间不得晚于当天，否则视为无效时间</font>

column.name: XMMC
column.comment: 立项流程审批通过方可发起内核流程。

constraint.SQL:
["EXISTS(
	SELECT 1 FROM DUAL WHERE 
	ECIF.FUNC_IB_LCFQCSJY('lcIB_NHLCB',tIB_XMXX_XSB.ID,tIB_XMXX_XSB.XMLX,{1})=1)
AND KPJD = 111 
AND (EXISTS (
 SELECT 1
 FROM ECIF.lcIB_LXLCB T1,JGCRM.OS_WFENTRY T2
 WHERE T1.INSTID = T2.ID
 AND T2.STATE = 4
 AND T1.XMMC = tIB_XMXX_XSB.ID
) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1
 FROM ECIF.lcIB_XSB_LXSMSHLC T3, JGCRM.OS_WFENTRY T4
 WHERE T3.INSTID = T4.ID
 AND T4.STATE = 4
 AND T3.XMMC = tIB_XMXX_XSB.ID))
OR ID = {0}",[{"expression":"XMMC","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1},{"expression":"ID","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1}]]

column.name: DGSCBL
column.describe: 全面尽职调查阶段上传比例

column.name: QYMC
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> XMQY != 37

validator.name: expression
validator.message: 项目组成员不得超过30人

column.name: BJYWDBR
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> XMMC.GPLX!=3

column.name: XMRYXXTS
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '<font color=red>请先检查项目组负责人、项目组成员、保荐业务代表人是否正确，再修改项目组人员信息。</font>'

column.name: KGGDDH_SJKZR
column.describe: 控股股东(实际控制人)电话

column.name: KGGDYX_SJKZR
column.describe: 控股股东(实际控制人)邮箱

column.name: NMXXDJB
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var url='/excelOut?ywlx=110000&insid='+InstID+'&lcbd=lcIB_NHLCB'; '' //'下载'
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> LB.getClient().isStandard==false

column.name: WDYBDXX
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_NULLSUB(SJLY,'0')!=1

column.name: JGTS
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '
客户单位是否持有“武器装备科研生产保密资格证书”、“武器装备科研生产许可证书”、“武器装备质量管理体系证书”、“装备承制单位资格证书”四证之一'

column.name: DBXZ
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var url='/gdlcDown?lcbdid='+ID+'&insid='+InstID+'&fjlx=3'+'&yhid='+$Login.User; '' //'下载'
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> LB.getClient().isStandard==false

column.name: FJXZ
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var url='/gdlcDown?lcbdid='+ID+'&insid='+InstID+'&fjlx=2'+'&yhid='+$Login.User; '' //'下载'

column.name: BGQNSFZJZY
column.describe: 报告期内是否资金占用

column.name: ZJZYJJQKSM
column.describe: 资金占用解决情况说明

column.name: ZXRZNSHRY
column.describe: 投资银行总部职能审核人员
column.comment: 原来为中小融职能审批人员

constraint.SQL: ["tUser.OrgID in (SELECT ID FROM JGCRM.LBORGANIZATION START WITH ID = 13831 CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = FID) \r\nand tUser.Status = 1",[]]
["tUser.OrgID in (SELECT ID FROM JGCRM.LBORGANIZATION START WITH ID = 13831 CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = FID) \r\nand tUser.Status = 1",[]]

column.name: SHXT
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var i = ABS_LOADBEAN('com.apex.bss.mod.ibb.systemdocking.apexsoft.livebosbean.PageJumpToAms');
//var url=i.getLivebosPageUrl('admin','tIB_ZSHRW','tIB_ZSHRW_XJRW','');
var url=i.getCompleteUrl($Login.User.UserID,'/bss/ams/page/index.sdo#task')
 '<input type="button" onclick=\'window.open("'+url+'")\' value="审核系统" />'
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0

column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0

column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0||ZKBSFYYJ != 1

column.name: SHYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0||ZKBSFYYJ != 1

column.name: ZKBSHYJHZ
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var cnt1= ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam  where paramname='ams.system'");
var cnt2 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.lcIB_NHLCB_ZKBSHYJHZ  where lcIB_NHLCB_ID=?",[ID]);
(cnt1==0&&cnt2==0)||( cnt1==1 && ZKBSFYYJ==null)

column.describe: 是否上传内核问题汇总

CJNHJY !=1

column.name: XMDGYJXX
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT TO_CHAR(WM_CONCAT('底稿移交时间:' || DGYJSJ || ' | ' || '底稿存放地点及具体位置:' || CFDD || ' | ' || '底稿数量:' || DGSL || ' | ' || '底稿编号:' || DGBH || '|')) FROM ecif.lcIB_NHLCB_NHCL WHERE lcIB_NHLCB_ID = ?",[ID])

constraint.SQL:
["NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ECIF.lcIB_NHLCB T,JGCRM.OS_WFENTRY WF
 WHERE XMMC = tIB_XMXX_XSB.ID 
								 AND WF.ID = T.INSTID
									AND WF.STATE IN (1,4)
									AND (NHJG = 1 OR NHJG IS NULL))
AND KPJD = 111
OR ID = {0}",[{"expression":"XMMC","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1}]]
